Package eus.klimu.channel.domain.service.definition

Interface ChannelService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ChannelServiceImp
public interface ChannelService
Definition of the different functions available for a channel.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Channel> addAllChannels​(java.util.List<Channel> channels)
    Add a full list of channels.
    Channel addNewChannel​(Channel channel)
    Add a new channel.
    java.lang.Long countAll()
    Count all the channels.
    void deleteChannel​(Channel channel)
    Delete a channel.
    java.util.List<Channel> getAllChannels()
    Get all the channels.
    Channel getChannel​(long id)
    Get a channel using its ID.
    Channel getChannel​(java.lang.String name)
    Get a channel using its name.
    Channel updateChannel​(Channel channel)
    Update a channel.

  • Method Details

    • countAll

      java.lang.Long countAll()
      Count all the channels.
      Returns:
      The number of channels on the database.

    • getChannel

      Channel getChannel​(long id)
      Get a channel using its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the channel.
      Returns:
      The channel with that ID, if found.

    • getChannel

      Channel getChannel​(java.lang.String name)
      Get a channel using its name.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the channel.
      Returns:
      The channel with that name, if found.

    • getAllChannels

      java.util.List<Channel> getAllChannels()
      Get all the channels.
      Returns:
      A list with all the channels found.

    • addNewChannel

      Channel addNewChannel​(Channel channel)
      Add a new channel.
      Parameters:
      channel - The channel that is going to be saved.
      Returns:
      The channel after being saved, with a new ID.

    • addAllChannels

      java.util.List<Channel> addAllChannels​(java.util.List<Channel> channels)
      Add a full list of channels.
      Parameters:
      channels - The list of channels that are going to be saved.
      Returns:
      The list of channels after being saved, with a new ID.

    • updateChannel

      Channel updateChannel​(Channel channel)
      Update a channel.
      Parameters:
      channel - The channel that is going to be updated.
      Returns:
      The channel after being updated.

    • deleteChannel

      void deleteChannel​(Channel channel)
      Delete a channel.
      Parameters:
      channel - The channel that is going to be deleted.
